data.title: Great venue for local beers
data.text: I love their winter warmers. It's one beer I love waiting on after thanksgiving. Thy have lots of great beers, food is good too, love the ambiance. They have indoor and outdoor seating. Service is good, and I highly recommend people who are beer lovers to come here... mixed drinks are available in other nearby areas

data.title: Lots of beer choices
data.text: We called ahead to see if our PAC 12 team would be on TV as we were traveling from another state, we were delighted when they said they would accommodate us. Even though our team lost we enjoyed our beers from the wide selection they offered and the nachos were great too!

data.title: Great Saturday night casual dinner
data.text: Great selection of beer of tap. Wonderful hot pretzels. Our quesadillas were tasty and the brownie sundae was amazing. High energy - including a wonderful waitress. If we lived here, we'd make this a place to eat regularly.

data.title: Great burgers
data.text: This is a busy, noisy place, so not the place to go for a romantic dinner. The burgers are moist and very tasty with house ground beef, or so they say. Chipotle bacon burger was especially good and the beer is great.

data.title: Good but busy
data.text: Love San Tan but so do a lot of other people as it is very busy and waits are the norm. Good food and beer though that makes it worth it if you have the time.

data.title: Not impressed!
data.text: We were looking for a place to get beer and food. This place looked like a neat place to go in downtown Chandler AZ but it didn't turn out to be the best choice.  After looking over the menu and the specials for that evening, One person ordered the downtown chandler chicken tacos and the other ordered beef brisket sandwich. Of course beers were ordered (after our first choice was shot down because it wasn't available) the amber ale was ordered as the waitress recommend it. Beer was ok....food not so good. The tacos way to spicy (this was not mentioned on the menu that they were SPICY tacos) and the rice and beans that came with tasted like it had been sitting out all day then re-heated!! Disgusting!! Beef brisket not to terrible but the fries that came with were mushy! No impressed and probably won't go back! Only positive was our waitress was nice!

data.title: Great pub food and brew!
data.text: A biking friend from Bangkok and I met for lunch during my stay in the Phoenix area.  We sampled several brews as well as a good sampling of food from the bar.  It all was excellent and I shall return!  Good job Santan.

data.title: Nice Brewery
data.text:
If your looking for a place to watch the game over a beer and comfort food this is an above average option. Great patio, plenty of TVs and BBQ. 
I would head back here again if I'm in the area but I would not consider this a destination in itself.

data.title: Brew Pub
data.text: One of many brewery/brewpubs in the Phoenix area. Most any of their beers are better than B/M/C but few are really outstanding and would consider none world class. Nice atmosphere and attentive bartenders. Good food. Probably would only return in search of new brews.

data.title: Iconic..
data.text: I usually bring family and friends who visit from out of town. The black bean burger is the best I've ever had.. and they substitute for any burger on the menu. The beer is the best around, but as a craft beer lover, I wouldn't go out of my way. The management isn't awesome here, and the employees are always grumpy, and seem to turn over quickly. We prefer earlier hours before it gets too crowded. It starts to feel like sardines in a pack during busy hours, and said grumpy employees turn agitated and rude after while.

data.title: Very good
data.text: Fries are excellent.  Paid an extra dollar for onion rings-won't do that again.  Onion Rings  were no where near as good as the fries.  Burgers were great.  Quick  friendly service.

data.title: Margherita Pizza
data.text: Their Margherita pizzas are always delicious! I've never had any problems with a single order in the years I've been frequenting this place.

data.title: Great Brew Pub
data.text: Stopped at SanTan for lunch having never been before. Food was very good, portions large! My husband is a Guinness man and loved the pub's stout! They had several beers that looked interesting, and the menu has something for everyone . Wait staff was attentive and pleasant! We will definitely go back!

data.title: Hopping place
data.text: Visited here several times over a 6-day business trip.  Efficient, friendly staff - good drinks, GREAT food.  I especially recommend the cobb salad and the soft pretzels.

data.title: Good microbrewery
data.text: Really enjoy going here good food and exceptional microbrews. Have a lot of fun sitting outside and enjoying a good beer and good food

data.title: Tasty beer and burgers
data.text: We had a great experience here during our visit to Phoenix.  The beer was good and the burger was fantastic.  I had the potato salad which I loved.  The peppercorn beer was tastier than I thought it would be. Our waitress was super sweet and took great care of us.

data.title: Amazing
data.text: We had the pineapple beer and the pretzel bites .. both absolutely amazing .. also the burger .. this place is 5 star , and they donate allot back to community . Support support support them .

data.title: Excellent beer and so-so food
data.text: Ever since the chef changed last year, the food has been just average pub fare. The beer is always excellent and the burgers are good, even if they are usually overcooked.

data.title: Excellent brewery for food and drinks
data.text: We have stopped by the brewery a number of times and always have exceptional service, food and drinks.  I enjoy all of their beers and often pick them up at the store or take home a growler. The food is great and reasonably priced for a brewery.

data.title: Phoenix trip
data.text: My wife and I were visiting the Phoenix area for the first time. Looking for something good to do on Friday night we turned to Trip Advisor. The reviews for SanTan were very good so we gave it a shot. First off, we both love beer. And we both agree that SanTan has some of the very best beer that we've ever had. Very impressive. I like the open air look and feel of the place too. We had two apps and a flight of beer. Highly recommended! We'll be back.
